column5: and CG is off, four off his first ball in IPL in India! Malinga goes for the yorker, slides down the pads, Gayle helps it to fine leg. Sweet as!
another yorker down the wrong line, flicked to fine leg for one
slower ball, Ganguly is comprehensively beaten, falls awkwardly in front of Tare, the keeper, they steal a bye
slower offcutter, 131.3ks, Gayle is into the stab long before the ball arrives, beaten comprehensively
another slower ball, this time Gayle is with it, and shoulders arms

Tare should have done better than that! Another slower ball, really slow, 107ks, and Gayle is beaten again. By now Tare should have known what to expect and stayed low, but he didn't, and let go four byes
and nearly again! inside edge, almost through that gap, shaping in towards the off stick late, and somehow Dada gets an inside edge
on a length, around off, defended to cover
around that length around off again, played with an open face towards point
full and straight, around middle, Gayle defends, a big shot can't be away
around off again, just short of driving length, and he plays with an open face to point
end of a good over, no room again, and just short of that driving arc, played to cover
Ganguly looks to make room first ball and he follows him with a yorker outside leg, which passes between Ganguly and the stumps
oh McLaren goes by what he must heard all this while, bowl short into Ganguly's ribs, and Ganguly somehow gets glove on that awkward pull shot
much better, what a reply from Dada! moves across the stumps, takes a back-of-a-length delivery and whips it fine, beating long leg
vintage Ganguly! McLaren's plan has been hit for a six! Bowls short and wide, and he has creamed him past point
full and wide down the leg side
plays with an open face, towards point, where Sathish and Pollard are almost an electric fence
steps down the track, wafts and misses, and again the ball bounces in front of Tare, who gets his body behind it this time, hence the fumble results in just one bye
full length dive from Dhawan at cover, saves a single
short, and sharp, and Ganguly pulls awkwardly, and somehow gets it over the infield, and the fast outfield does the rest
angling into him, looks to help it down to fine leg, misses it, but it is headed down the leg side
walks down the wicket and across the stumps, and misses the pick-up shot
beautiful legcutter from Zak, he has swallowed many a left-hander with it, Ganguly wafts at it outside off, and is beaten
and he is beaten again, steps out of the crease a touch too early, Zak bangs it in short and it beats his pull shot, moving away too after pitching
slower ball again, defended to cover
vicious offcutter, Gayle reaches out and stabs at it, the edge lands short of Pollard at backward point
shoulders arms to another offcutter
falls short of Pollard at backward point, Gayle not having a good time of it out there, slower ball again and he reaches out again, just short of a diving Pollard and some how goes through him
quicker delivery, quick yorker on the pads, gets down just in time, for a single
quick bouncer, into the ribs, played back to Malinga
yorker around off, fields it one bounce
stays full, way down the leg side, and he lets out a big big appeal. Umpire Hazare not to be fooled
Bravo is perhaps the best fielder of his own bowling, Gayle misses a pick-up shot on the pads, Bravo is off to short midwicket in a flash to field and deny them a leg-bye
misses the line on the full ball on pads again
slower ball, and he dives full length across the pitch but can't prevent a single to mid-off
Ganguly looks to make room, Bravo fires in a leg-stump yorker, he digs it out to mid-off
clears the front leg for a slog and gets a bottom edge, slightly slower delivery
and Bravo pitches up outside leg again, and Ganguly takes full toll, goes across and helps it fine of long leg
fires into the pads, worked away for one
and well bowled, flighted generously, outside leg, Dada steps out, is beaten by the dip, but gets his body behind it
flatter delivery, and worked away for one
full and fast, yorker literally, dug out
comes down the track again, gets too close to its pitch, gets a single to long-off
gives him the charge, Bhaj fires into his pads, Gayle gets a single down to long-on
one of the flatter sixes, short and murdered, never really left the ground, and in a jiffy it was out of the playing field
full and fast, hit powerfully down to long-off
full and wide outside off, hit straight to mid-off after having made room
bunts one length ball into the covers for a single
full and straight, hit down to long-on for a single
slower ball, Ganguly way early into the shot, but somehow it bounces in front of long-on
gets away with a freebie, half-tracker outside the leg stump with fine leg up, but Ganguly pulls it straight to the man
full and fast, driven down to long-off for a single
flighted outside leg, spinning towards the stumps, Gayle fails to connect on the sweep
outside leg again, Gayle works it square of short fine for a single
full and fast again, played with an open face, still only a single to sweeper-cover
Gayle looks to give him the charge, Bhaj fires it into the pads again, just a single again
low full toss, hit powerfully to long-on
slower, slightly slower, and he hits a shortish delivery down to long-on
full toss, and and murdered down the ground, Bravo does well to field it at long-on, he had moved only about six feet by the time ball arrived
Ganguly pulls, top-edges, and it somehow lands safe, behind short fine and in front of deep square
low full toss again, and hit down to long-off for one
over-pitched delivery, driven wide of long-off, comes back for two
full toss outside off, and still a single, mane full tosses hit for singles
shorter delivery, makes room, can't get it wide of point
flighted around off, gets a single to cover
tossed up, just short of driving length, punched down to long-off
sees Ganguly move away, he fires it full and wide across him
and Bhaj has done his Dada in! slows the pace down again, flighted outside leg, the break beats Ganguly's waft, and out goes the middle stump
Gayle looks to make room, McLaren bowls a yorker, just outside leg, and is called a wide
another yorker, digs it out this time
another full toss hit just for a single, down to long-on
looks in good touch right away, punched wide of sweeper-cover, but they decide against the second
another yorker, and Gayle can't do much with it
full toss again, and again all he can do with it is hit it to long-on
very nice yorker, Shah digs it out, and almost gets it over McLaren who leaps high and gets a hand to it to save a single
yorker by Bhaj, Gayle hits it down to long-off
nice offbreak, no room, bunts it into covers for a single
Malinga fumbles at long-on and they take a couple, was hit forcefully down to him
another nice yorker, pitching on the crease, can't do much with that either
this yorker is around off, and he squeezes it past Bhaj for a single
steps down, Bhaj fires a fast full toss, and again just a single to long-on. Good spell by Bhaj
low full toss and again just bunted down to long-on
nicely played, Gayle gets the better of the leg-side yorker this time, stays back, gets inside the line, and turns it past short fine leg - first boundary in 37 balls
low full toss, gets under it, punches it, but it is just a single to deep midwicket
slower ball, dragged from outside off to wide of long-on
toe-ended into the V behind the stumps, wide yorker, Shah throws everything at it, and the edge beats short third - not smart bowling with the third man up in the circle
this yorker is closer to off, and is hit down to long-on for one
starts off with a bouncer, pulled away for a single to deep square leg
low full toss hit to cover for one
short ball dragged from way outside off to deep square leg
well bowled, yorker on middle stump, pitching on the crease, hit back to Malinga
misfires with the slower off cutter, too wide of off
slower ball again, guides it to slightly wide of Pollard, who doesn't field it cleanly, and they get through for one
that is a top shot, this is a good delivery and it's a boundary manufactured, stays deep in the crease, pre-meditating a yorker, and yorker it is, and moves across to flick it past midwicket
one-handed pull for four, the short ball stops at him and he pulls one-handed, past short fine leg - his s/r reaches 100 - he has also reached his IPL best
that's the first time he has taken full toll of a full toss, moves back to a low full toss and crashes it past short fine - that's his fifty too
yorker on the pads, manages just a leg-bye
low full toss, and he misses out again! Hits it straight to midwicket
shorter ball, and he pulls it to deep square leg
mis-hits it over long-on boundary, that's the power of Gayle! Gets this full toss high on his bat but goes through with the shot and clears the field
full toss again, he gets it over square leg for two - another full toss doesn't see the fence
yorker on leg stump, hit straight to short fine, Bravo is not back to take the throw and Tendulkar's throw is far off the stumps - 50-run partnership
looks to hit across the line, slices it down to long-off
yorker outside leg stump again, this time they run urgently, and take a couple after having placed it just wide of fine leg
another full toss missed, makes no contact with the bat here, gets a leg-bye
full outside off, plays with an open face, gets a single, another over without a boundary
in the block hole again, hit down the ground for a single
inside edge for four! clears the front leg for the big shot, but the edge rushes past short fine
violence! misses the yorker by inches, and Gayle murders it. almost taking out the umpire with the straight hit
ends up chipping an intended extra-cover drive, gets two as it falls short of the deep fielder
makes room for the cover drive, can't get it past extra cover
yorker down the leg side, and Tare should have really collected this one, two runs given away
slower ball, Gayle aborts the big shot, gets a single to point
moves across the stumps, stays deep in the crease, anticipating a yorker, Malinga bowls a slower ball, he flicks it to fine leg for one
again a slower ball, and Gain Gayle gets just a single off it - to cover-point
slower ball, hit powerfully to leg, Dhawan makes a nice sliding save at deep square and gets it back fast
misdirects this slower offcutter, too wide of off stump
slower ball again, Gayle goes after it, and the top edge flies over short third man, and Zaheer - running back - misjudges it and they get three extra runs
full delivery, hit down the ground for one
nice shot, shuffles across, manufacture a leg-side line, and flicks a low full toss past short fine
this time he makes room and gets outside the line, Zak bowls the same delivery and he misses it, and is bowled
slower bouncer, beats Mathews comprehensively, and finally Tare keeps well despite the break away from him
full toss again, and again he can't get it away, hits it just wide of long-on
perfect yorker, can get just a single off it

Has he broken the toe? What a lovely yorker, tailing in late, beats Gayle's bat, gets him on the back toe, Gayle is limping for a leg-bye. Umpire Hazare adds insult to injury, giving him lbw when the ball is sliding down. Hazare won't want this to go close - this one leg-bye could be crucial in the end
